title: MD Geist II: Death Force
synopsis: After unleashing the Death Force machines all over the planet Jerra, Geist has kept himself busy by dismantling them one by one. But now he faces a formidable opponent in the form of Krauser, another M.D.S. (Most Dangerous Soldier) who has aligned himself as the only savior of mankind.
staff: [['Ohata, Koichi', ['Director', ' Script', ' Mechanical Design', ' Creator']], ['Kishi, Masayuki', ['Theme Song Composition']], ['Ooshiro, Tsutomu', ['Key Animation']], ['Kozuma, Shinsaku', ['Key Animation']]]
